title: Chase the Dream
description: Touring the world with Redfall, one of rock 'n roll's hottest bands, wasn't the life Cameron Chapman's parents dreamed of for him. Born into a privileged Boston family, Cam was expected to continue in the Chapman mold: the perfect job, the perfect wife, the perfect life--and above all else, no scandals.But that ship sailed a long time ago.A virtuoso on the violin, her music is the only thing Samantha McKenzie can rely on after almost losing the most precious thing in her life. She'll sacrifice everything to keep her daughter safe...even if it means hiding from her past and burying her own dreams.Meeting the beautiful and mysterious Samantha opens Cam's eyes to possibilities he's never considered, and he makes it his mission to unravel her secrets. But will her past come back to haunt her, or will they choose to chase a new dream together?
author: B.B. Miller
